WARNING:

Magnets should not be used by: Pregnant woman, people who use electrical implants, pacemaker, defibrillator and insulin pumps. Never apply over an open wound or a medical patch.

 

MEDICAL DISCLAIMER:

Magnetic therapy products and or treatments are not sold as medical devices or medical replacements. Our magnetic products and or treatments are not sold to cure diseases and cannot be relied on to supply medical benefits and are not a substitute for proper medical care. No guarantee of effectiveness of this product and or treatment is made; effectiveness varies from person to person. Magnetic therapy is not intended to replace any instructions, prescriptions or directions prescribed by your doctor. Not recommended for persons wearing a pacemaker, defibrillator, or any other implanted electro-medical device or if you are pregnant. Keep magnets away from computer disks, videotapes, video monitors, credit cards and any other magnetic media.
